verses.verse: And <WG2532> I heard <WG191> <WG5656> a great <WG3173> voice <WG5456> out of <WG1537> the temple <WG3485> saying <WG3004> <WG5723> to the seven <WG2033> angels <WG32>, Go your ways <WG5217> <WG5720>, and <WG2532> pour out <WG1632> <WG5657> the vials <WG5357> of the wrath <WG2372> of 'Elohim <WG2316> upon <WG1519> the earth <WG1093>.

And <WG2532> the first <WG4413> went <WG565> <WG5627>, and <WG2532> poured out <WG1632> <WG5656> his <WG846> vial <WG5357> upon <WG1909> the earth <WG1093>; and <WG2532> there fell <WG1096> <WG5633> a noisome <WG2556> and <WG2532> grievous <WG4190> sore <WG1668> upon <WG1519> the men <WG444> which <WG3588> had <WG2192> <WG5723> the mark <WG5480> of the beast <WG2342>, and <WG2532> upon them which worshipped <WG4352> <WG5723> his <WG846> image <WG1504>.

And <WG2532> the second <WG1208> angel <WG32> poured out <WG1632> <WG5656> his <WG846> vial <WG5357> upon <WG1519> the sea <WG2281>; and <WG2532> it became <WG1096> <WG5633> as <WG5613> the blood <WG129> of a dead <WG3498> man: and <WG2532> every <WG3956> living <WG2198> <WG5723> soul <WG5590> died <WG599> <WG5627> in <WG1722> the sea <WG2281>.

And <WG2532> the third <WG5154> angel <WG32> poured out <WG1632> <WG5656> his <WG846> vial <WG5357> upon <WG1519> the rivers <WG4215> and <WG2532> <WG1519> fountains <WG4077> of waters <WG5204>; and <WG2532> they became <WG1096> <WG5633> blood <WG129>.

And <WG2532> I heard <WG191> <WG5656> the angel <WG32> of the waters <WG5204> say <WG3004> <WG5723>, Thou art <WG1488> <WG5748> righteous <WG1342>, O YY <WG2962>, which <WG3588> art <WG5607> <WG5752> <WG5625> <WG3801>, and <WG2532> wast <WG2258> <WG5713> <WG5625> <WG3801>, and <WG2532> shalt be <WG3741> <WG5706> <WG5625> <WG3801>, because <WG3754> thou hast judged <WG2919> <WG5656> thus <WG5023>.

For <WG3754> they have shed <WG1632> <WG5656> the blood <WG129> of saints <WG40> and <WG2532> prophets <WG4396>, and <WG2532> thou hast given <WG1325> <WG5656> them <WG846> blood <WG129> to drink <WG4095> <WG5629>; for <WG1063> they are <WG1526> <WG5748> worthy <WG514>.

And <WG2532> I heard <WG191> <WG5656> another <WG243> out of <WG1537> the altar <WG2379> say <WG3004> <WG5723>, Havahn so <WG3483>, YY <WG2962> 'Elohim <WG2316> Almighty <WG3841>, true <WG228> and <WG2532> righteous <WG1342> are thy <WG4675> judgments <WG2920>.

And <WG2532> the fourth <WG5067> angel <WG32> poured out <WG1632> <WG5656> his <WG846> vial <WG5357> upon <WG1909> the sun <WG2246>; and <WG2532> power was given <WG1325> <WG5681> unto him <WG846> to scorch <WG2739> <WG5658> men <WG444> with <WG1722> fire <WG4442>.

And <WG2532> men <WG444> were scorched <WG2739> <WG5681> with great <WG3173> heat <WG2738>, and <WG2532> blasphemed <WG987> <WG5656> the name <WG3686> of 'Elohim <WG2316>, which <WG3588> hath <WG2192> <WG5723> power <WG1849> over <WG1909> these <WG5025> plagues <WG4127>: and <WG2532> they repented <WG3340> <WG5656> not <WG3756> to give <WG1325> <WG5629> him <WG846> glory <WG1391>.

And <WG2532> the fifth <WG3991> angel <WG32> poured out <WG1632> <WG5656> his <WG846> vial <WG5357> upon <WG1909> the seat <WG2362> of the beast <WG2342>; and <WG2532> his <WG846> kingdom <WG932> was <WG1096> <WG5633> full of darkness <WG4656> <WG5772>; and <WG2532> they gnawed <WG3145> <WG5711> their <WG846> tongues <WG1100> for <WG1537> pain <WG4192>,

And <WG2532> blasphemed <WG987> <WG5656> the 'Elohim <WG2316> of heaven <WG3772> because of <WG1537> their <WG846> pains <WG4192> and <WG2532> <WG1537> their <WG846> sores <WG1668>, and <WG2532> repented <WG3340> <WG5656> not <WG3756> of <WG1537> their <WG846> deeds <WG2041>.

And <WG2532> the sixth <WG1623> angel <WG32> poured out <WG1632> <WG5656> his <WG846> vial <WG5357> upon <WG1909> the great <WG3173> river <WG4215> Euphrates <WG2166>; and <WG2532> the water <WG5204> thereof <WG846> was dried up <WG3583> <WG5681>, that <WG2443> the way <WG3598> of the kings <WG935> of <WG575> the east <WG395> <WG2246> might be prepared <WG2090> <WG5686>.

And <WG2532> I saw <WG1492> <WG5627> three <WG5140> unclean <WG169> spirits <WG4151> like <WG3664> frogs <WG944> come out of <WG1537> the mouth <WG4750> of the dragon <WG1404>, and <WG2532> out of <WG1537> the mouth <WG4750> of the beast <WG2342>, and <WG2532> out of <WG1537> the mouth <WG4750> of the false prophet <WG5578>.

For <WG1063> they are <WG1526> <WG5748> the spirits <WG4151> of devils <WG1142>, working <WG4160> <WG5723> miracles <WG4592>, which go forth <WG1607> <WG5738> <WG5625> <WG3739> <WG5736> unto <WG1909> the kings <WG935> of the earth <WG1093> and <WG2532> of the whole <WG3650> world <WG3625>, to gather <WG4863> <WG5629> them <WG846> to <WG1519> the battle <WG4171> of that <WG1565> great <WG3173> day <WG2250> of 'Elohim <WG2316> Almighty <WG3841>.

Behold <WG2400> <WG5628>, I come <WG2064> <WG5736> as <WG5613> a thief <WG2812>. Blessed <WG3107> is he that watcheth <WG1127> <WG5723>, and <WG2532> keepeth <WG5083> <WG5723> his <WG846> garments <WG2440>, lest <WG3363> he walk <WG4043> <WG5725> naked <WG1131>, and <WG2532> they see <WG991> <WG5725> his <WG846> shame <WG808>.
And <WG2532> he gathered <WG4863> them <WG846> together <WG4863> <WG5627> into <WG1519> a place <WG5117> called <WG2564> <WG5746> in the Hebrew tongue <WG1447> Har-Megiddo <WG717>.

And <WG2532> the seventh <WG1442> angel <WG32> poured out <WG1632> <WG5656> his <WG846> vial <WG5357> into <WG1519> the air <WG109>; and <WG2532> there came <WG1831> <WG5627> a great <WG3173> voice <WG5456> out of <WG575> the temple <WG3485> of heaven <WG3772>, from <WG575> the throne <WG2362>, saying <WG3004> <WG5723>, It is done <WG1096> <WG5754>.

And <WG2532> there were <WG1096> <WG5633> voices <WG5456>, and <WG2532> thunders <WG1027>, and <WG2532> lightnings <WG796>; and <WG2532> there was <WG1096> <WG5633> a great <WG3173> earthquake <WG4578>, such as <WG3634> was <WG1096> <WG5633> not <WG3756> since <WG3739> <WG575> men <WG444> were <WG1096> <WG5633> upon <WG1909> the earth <WG1093>, so mighty <WG5082> an earthquake <WG4578>, and so <WG3779> great <WG3173>.

And <WG2532> the great <WG3173> city <WG4172> was divided <WG1096> <WG5633> into <WG1519> three <WG5140> parts <WG3313>, and <WG2532> the cities <WG4172> of the nations <WG1484> fell <WG4098> <WG5627>: and <WG2532> great <WG3173> Babylon <WG897> came in remembrance <WG3415> <WG5681> before <WG1799> 'Elohim <WG2316>, to give <WG1325> <WG5629> unto her <WG846> the cup <WG4221> of the wine <WG3631> of the fierceness <WG2372> of his <WG846> wrath <WG3709>.
And <WG2532> every <WG3956> island <WG3520> fled away <WG5343> <WG5627>, and <WG2532> the mountains <WG3735> were <WG2147> not <WG3756> found <WG2147> <WG5681>.

And <WG2532> there fell <WG2597> <WG5719> upon <WG1909> men <WG444> a great <WG3173> hail <WG5464> out of <WG1537> heaven <WG3772>, every stone about <WG5613> the weight of a talent <WG5006>: and <WG2532> men <WG444> blasphemed <WG987> <WG5656> 'Elohim <WG2316> because of <WG1537> the plague <WG4127> of the hail <WG5464>; for <WG3754> the plague <WG4127> thereof <WG846> was <WG2076> <WG5748> exceeding <WG4970> great <WG3173>.
